data.title: Dover Fueling Solutions and TSG Exhibit as Partners at the Forecourt Show
data.meta_description: Dover Fueling Solutions and TSG Exhibit as Partners at the Forecourt Show
data.text:
Dover Fueling Solutions (DFS), a Dover company delivering advanced fuel dispensing equipment, electronic systems and payment, fleet systems, automatic tank gauging and wetstock management, will be exhibiting alongside its valued distribution partner, TSG, at this year’s Forecourt Show – an event which will mark the first occasion that DFS has joined forces with TSG at a fuel industry exhibition. This trade show will take place between the 8th and 10th of April at the National Exhibition Centre (NEC) in Birmingham, UK.

This exhibition provides the perfect opportunity to emphasize the solid distribution partnership between DFS and TSG and the ideal platform to promote DFS’ extensive, global product portfolio. TSG Business Development Director, Michelle Machesney noted, “We are incredibly proud to be recognized as a valued distributor of DFS and believe that this show will underline the partnership to our mutual customers.”

DFS VP of EMEA Jeroen de Gruijter stated, “This is an exciting time for DFS, being able to work with TSG to promote a range of our industry-leading product brands for the first time. We look forward to collaborating with TSG at many more exhibitions in the future.”

DFS encourages attendees to stop by stand W129 to find out more about how both businesses are working together to provide a comprehensive solution to the fuel retailing market. Among additional DFS products and solutions, visitors can expect to see:

The Tokheim Fuel POS® point-of-sale system;

The Fairbanks Station Manager 365 online web portal and its 24/7 real-time wetstock monitoring service; and,

The ProGauge MagLink LX console and wired and wireless magnetostrictive probes.

In addition, the Forecourt Show will provide the ideal platform for DFS to launch its new dispenser range: the Tokheim QuantiumTM 510M. On display at the show will be the Tokheim Quantium™ 510M FHR (full hose retraction) ten Hose AdBlue® Combi fuel dispenser, one of four models in the new dispenser range.
